summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss logistics, RSVPs, and security requirements for attorneys and victims attending briefings in Miami and New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the FBI briefings.

persons.name: FBI Victim Specialist
persons.context: The FBI official from the New York Field Office organizing and sending invitations for the victim briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively organizing briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
Two briefings were scheduled: October 15, 2019, at the Miami Field Office and October 23, 2019, at the New York Field Office.
Attorneys were required to RSVP with detailed security information, including Social Security Number and personal address, to attend the federal building briefings.
The email chain indicates coordination between victim attorneys and the FBI to facilitate victim participation and information sharing.
